properties.title: How To: Read project data from a file
properties.author: Jon Iles

section.name: How To: Read project data from a file
section.p: There are two ways to read project data from a file: you can use a class provided by MPXJ which will select the correct Reader to open the file for you, or you can use a Reader class directly.
The example below illustrates how MPXJ can select the correct Reader class for you. The example assumes that you have provided the file name in the inputFile variable.
The second approach is to use one of the Reader classes directly if you know which type of project you are dealing with. This is shown by the example below.
